name: Love Decision
description:
Eric is a prince. Lately, his mother urges him to get married.

A bit different approach to Visual Novel with several dating events and endings, featuring Live2D animation system.

In the game you can:

  • become a king!
  • attack another country!
  • end the war!
  • forget about everything and run away with your maid!

The game has about 2 hours of content (All character routes. Also it depends on your reading speed).
